name: ✦ SmartWallet
title: Development of a budget management webapp
description:
SmartWallet is a budget management web application focused on tracking and managing expenses. It includes:
Real-time expense tracking,
Graphical report generation,
Authentication and authorization,
API integration for currency conversion,
Responsive design.

name: ✦ Mon vieux grimoire
title: Development of a library webapp
description:
Mon vieux grimoire is an online library project, I focused on the following features:
CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Authentication,
Token generation,
Password hashing (bcrypt),
Image optimization (multer/sharp)
